title: Wand
description: Book 2 of The Fern Witches Series*****************************Dana Quinn's staying power is tested as she forges new connections in Fern with the subtlety of a nor'easter. She turns on the charm and wields her increasingly strong powers as she tries to fit in with the women of the coven, but all's askew, as if the newest witch has tipped a tenuous balance among them. Villette Madden has met her match in Dana, and each is compelled to test the other's magickal prowess and patience.Dana discovers that fitting in is a whole new set of tricks when your status is permanent with the Fern witches. Beyond an immersion in the shadows with the dark wand lies a life-altering surprise.*******************The Fern Witches SeriesTalking to Trees, Book 1Wand, Book 2Silvery Moon, Book 3
author: Joanna MacOwl
